You plan to visit 5 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Dubrovnik for 6 days. You plan to stay in Stockholm for 3 days. During day 1 and day 3, you have to attend a conference in Stockholm. You plan to stay in Porto for 4 days. You want to spend 3 days in Valencia. You plan to visit relatives in Valencia between day 15 and day 17. You plan to stay in Barcelona for 5 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Stockholm and Dubrovnik, Dubrovnik and Barcelona, Stockholm and Barcelona, Barcelona and Valencia, Barcelona and Porto, Porto and Valencia.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
